nodes.text: Biguh Johs was a male Jawa who lived on the planet Rishi and ran a taxi service, taking passengers from the city of Raider's Cove on Horizon Island to the nearby Sky Ridge Island.

Biguh Johs appears on the planet Rishi as a taxi stop in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. Biguh Johs and the two other taxi stops on Rishi, Bluuto Karlabasy and Dakon Agapoui, mark the first time that non-droid characters have been used for taxi stops; all other worlds and Daily Areas use protocol droids.
